id716E27646FDD4084A95B064FF1D64D59.text: Section 2(b) of the ALS Disability Insurance Access Act of 2019 (Public Law 116–250) is amended by striking “"applications for disability insurance benefits filed after the date of enactment of this Act"” and inserting “"applications for disability insurance benefits approved after the date that is 5 months before the date of enactment of this Act"”.

source.xml:
<section identifier="/s1" id="idD81BE3E224704145B96503389351DBA8" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1">
	<num value="1">SECTION 1.</num>
	<heading> Retroactive access to social security disability benefits individuals with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS).</heading>
	<subsection identifier="/s1/a" id="id716E27646FDD4084A95B064FF1D64D59" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1">
		<num value="a">(a)</num>
		<heading> In general.—</heading>
		<content>Section 2(b) of the ALS Disability Insurance Access Act of 2019 (<ref href="/us/pl/116/250">Public Law 116–250</ref>) is amended by striking “<quotedText>applications for disability insurance benefits filed after the date of enactment of this Act</quotedText>” and inserting “<quotedText>applications for disability insurance benefits approved after the date that is 5 months before the date of enactment of this Act</quotedText>”.</content>
	</subsection>
</section>
source.text: Section 2(b) of the ALS Disability Insurance Access Act of 2019 (Public Law 116–250) is amended by striking “"applications for disability insurance benefits filed after the date of enactment of this Act"” and inserting “"applications for disability insurance benefits approved after the date that is 5 months before the date of enactment of this Act"”.

cite.cite_text: Section 2(b) of the ALS Disability Insurance Access Act of 2019 (Public Law 116–250)

doc_names: ALS Disability Insurance Access Act of 2019

source.xml:
<title identifier="/tIII" id="H1B203BA043974CEFA5A5CEE8A19FF030" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="24">
	<num value="III">Title III—</num>
	<heading>Miscellaneous Reforms</heading>
	<section identifier="/tIII/s308" id="H994DCA8C58AC4D1A82A0B483DE2347A2" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="29">
		<num value="308">Sec. 308.</num>
		<heading> Renaming Office of Compliance as Office of Congressional Workplace Rights</heading>
		<subsection identifier="/tIII/s308/b" id="HE52DCF2F721149CF9E33CCDF869711B7" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="30">
			<num value="b">(b)</num>
			<heading> Conforming amendments to Congressional Accountability Act of 1995.—</heading>
			<chapeau>The Congressional Accountability Act of 1995, as amended by section 305(a), is further amended as follows:</chapeau>
			<paragraph identifier="/tIII/s308/b/11" id="H138E6E6949BE42E29F642F0CF1EB7AA2" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="30">
				<num value="11">(11)</num>
				<content> In the title heading of title III, by striking <quotedContent>“Office of Compliance”</quotedContent> and inserting <quotedContent>“Office of Congressional Workplace Rights”</quotedContent>.</content>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
	</section>
</title>
source.text: The Congressional Accountability Act of 1995, as amended by section 305(a), is further amended as follows: In the title heading of title III, by striking “Office of Compliance” and inserting “Office of Congressional Workplace Rights”.
